lyric:
[00:09.580]I had a dream so big and loud
[00:12.200]I jumped so high I touched the clouds
[00:14.690]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[00:19.330]I stretched my hands out to the sky
[00:21.580]We danced with monsters through the night
[00:24.390]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[00:28.760]I'm never gonna look back
[00:30.700]Woah, never gonna give it up
[00:33.070]No, please don't wake me now
[00:38.700]Oo-o-o-o-oo
[00:41.430]This is gonna be the best day of my li-ife
[00:45.480]My li-i-i-i-i-ife
[00:48.990]Oo-o-o-o-oo
[00:51.120]This is gonna be the best day of my li-ife
[00:54.990]My li-i-i-i-i-ife
[01:07.240]I howled at the moon with friends
[01:09.670]And then the sun came crashing in
[01:12.170]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[01:16.680]But all the possibilities
[01:19.170]No limits just epiphanies
[01:21.740]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2

[02:03.880]I hear it calling outside my window
[02:08.450]I feel it in my soul (soul)
[02:13.260]The stars were burning so bright
[02:15.580]The sun was out 'til midnight
[02:17.950]I say we lose control (control)
[02:35.390]This is gonna be the best day of my li-ife
[02:39.380]My li-i-i-i-i-ife
[02:42.330]Oo-o-o-o-o
[02:45.010]This is gonna be the best day of my li-ife
[02:48.900]My li-i-i-i-i-ife
[02:52.200]This is gonna be, this is gonna be, this is gonna be
[02:56.070]The best day of my life
[02:59.260]Everything is looking up, everybody up now
[03:04.110]This is gonna be the best day of my li-ife
[03:08.220]My li-i-i-i-i-ife
tlyric:
[by:夜尽天明mcs]
[00:09.58]我有一个伟大而响亮的梦想
[00:12.20]我跳得很高可以触摸云朵
[00:14.69]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[00:19.33]我把我的手伸出天空
[00:21.58]我们与怪兽共舞达旦
[00:24.39]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[00:28.76]我从不回头看
[00:30.70]我永不言弃
[00:33.07]请别让我醒来
[00:38.70]Oo-o-o-o-oo
[00:41.43]这将是我生命中最棒的一天
[00:45.48]最棒的一天
[00:48.99]Oo-o-o-o-oo
[00:51.12]这将是我生命中最棒的一天
[00:54.99]最棒的一天
[00:58.17]（伴奏）
[01:07.24]我和我的小伙伴们对月长嚎
[01:09.67]然后阳光洒遍大地
[01:12.17]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[01:16.68]未来充满机遇和挑战
[01:19.17]梦想无限 灵光一现
[01:21.74]Wo-o-o-o-o-oh x2
[01:26.49]我从不回头看
[01:28.24]也永不言弃
[01:30.43]请别让我醒来
[01:34.56]Oo-o-o-o-oo
[01:37.89]这将是我生命中最棒的一天
[01:41.70]最棒的一天
[01:44.70]Oo-o-o-o-oo
[01:47.46]这将是我生命中最棒的一天
[01:51.26]最棒的一天
[01:54.52]（伴奏）
[02:03.88]我听到那窗外的召唤
[02:08.45]与我的灵魂产生共鸣
[02:13.26]满天的繁星如此耀眼
[02:15.58]长夜过去 阳光浮现
[02:17.95]让我们疯狂起来
[02:23.46]（伴奏）

[02:45.01]这将是我生命中最棒的一天
[02:48.90]最棒的一天

[02:59.26]每件事都顺利，每个人现在都嗨起来
[03:04.11]这将是我生命中最棒的一天
